trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_MEM_ALLOC_ERROR = 25 — Error allocating memory.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_MEM_ALLOC_ERROR = 25 —分配内存时出错。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_NOT_AUTHORIZED = 1 — Not authorized to use the command on the UPNPDevice. May be returned when the user disabled UPNP on their router.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_NOT_AUTHORIZED = 1- 无权使用UPNPDevice上的命令。用户在路由器上禁用UPNP时可能会返回。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_NO_DEVICES = 27 — No devices available. You may need to call discover first, or discovery didn’t detect any valid UPNPDevices.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_NO_DEVICES = 27 —无可用设备。您可能需要先调用发现，或者发现未检测到任何有效的UPNPDevice。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_NO_GATEWAY = 26 — No gateway available. You may need to call discover first, or discovery didn’t detect any valid IGDs (InternetGatewayDevices).
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_NO_GATEWAY = 26 —无可用网关。您可能需要先致电发现，或者发现未检测到任何有效的IGD（InternetGatewayDevices）。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_NO_PORT_MAPS_AVAILABLE = 11 — No port maps are available. May also be returned if port mapping functionality is not available.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_NO_PORT_MAPS_AVAILABLE = 11 —没有可用的端口映射。如果端口映射功能不可用，也可能返回。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_NO_SUCH_ENTRY_IN_ARRAY = 4 — No such entry in array. May be returned if a given port, protocol combination is not found on an UPNPDevice.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_NO_SUCH_ENTRY_IN_ARRAY = 4 —数组中没有此类条目。如果在UPNPDevice上找不到给定的端口，协议组合，则可以返回。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_ONLY_PERMANENT_LEASE_SUPPORTED = 15 — Only permanent leases are supported. Do not use the duration parameter when adding port mappings.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_ONLY_PERMANENT_LEASE_SUPPORTED = 15-仅支持永久租赁。添加端口映射时，请勿使用 duration 参数。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_PORT_MAPPING_NOT_FOUND = 2 — No port mapping was found for the given port, protocol combination on the given UPNPDevice.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_PORT_MAPPING_NOT_FOUND = 2 —在给定的UPNPDevice上找不到给定端口，协议组合的端口映射。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_REMOTE_HOST_MUST_BE_WILDCARD = 9 — The remote host value must be a wildcard.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_REMOTE_HOST_MUST_BE_WILDCARD = 9 —远程主机值必须为通配符。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_SAME_PORT_VALUES_REQUIRED = 14 — External and internal port values must be the same.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_SAME_PORT_VALUES_REQUIRED = 14-外部和内部端口值必须相同。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_SOCKET_ERROR = 24 — Socket error.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_SOCKET_ERROR = 24 —套接字错误。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_SRC_IP_WILDCARD_NOT_PERMITTED = 6 — The UPNPDevice does not allow wildcard values for the source IP address.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_SRC_IP_WILDCARD_NOT_PERMITTED = 6 — UPNPDevice不允许源IP地址使用通配符值。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_SUCCESS = 0 — UPNP command or discovery was successful.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_SUCCESS = 0 — UPNP命令或发现成功。

trans-unit.source: UPNP_RESULT_UNKNOWN_ERROR = 28 — Unknown error.
trans-unit.target: UPNP_RESULT_UNKNOWN_ERROR = 28 —未知错误。

trans-unit.source: VALIGN_BOTTOM = 2 — Align the whole text to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: VALIGN_BOTTOM = 2 —将整个文本对齐到底部。

trans-unit.source: VALIGN_BOTTOM = 2 — Vertical bottom alignment, usually for text-derived classes.
trans-unit.target: VALIGN_BOTTOM = 2 —垂直底部对齐，通常用于文本派生的类。

trans-unit.source: VALIGN_CENTER = 1 — Align the whole text to the center.
trans-unit.target: VALIGN_CENTER = 1-将整个文本对齐到中心。

trans-unit.source: VALIGN_CENTER = 1 — Vertical center alignment, usually for text-derived classes.
trans-unit.target: VALIGN_CENTER = 1 —垂直居中对齐，通常用于文本派生的类。

trans-unit.source: VALIGN_FILL = 3 — Align the whole text by spreading the rows.
trans-unit.target: VALIGN_FILL = 3 —通过展开行来对齐整个文本。

trans-unit.source: VALIGN_TOP = 0 — Align the whole text to the top.
trans-unit.target: VALIGN_TOP = 0 —将整个文本对齐到顶部。

trans-unit.source: VALIGN_TOP = 0 — Vertical top alignment, usually for text-derived classes.
trans-unit.target: VALIGN_TOP = 0 —垂直顶部对齐，通常用于文本派生的类。

trans-unit.source: VAR_TO_BYTES = 60 — Serialize a Variant to a PoolByteArray.
trans-unit.target: VAR_TO_BYTES = 60 -序列化变到PoolByteArray。

trans-unit.source: VAR_TO_STR = 58 — Serialize a Variant to a string.
trans-unit.target: VAR_TO_STR = 58 —将Variant序列化为字符串。

trans-unit.source: VERTICAL = 1 — General vertical alignment, used usually for Separator, ScrollBar, Slider, etc.
trans-unit.target: VERTICAL = 1 —常规的垂直对齐方式，通常用于Separator，ScrollBar，Slider等。

trans-unit.source: VIDEO_DRIVER_GLES2 = 1 — The GLES2 rendering backend. It uses OpenGL ES 2.0 on mobile devices, OpenGL 2.1 on desktop platforms and WebGL 1.0 on the web.
trans-unit.target: VIDEO_DRIVER_GLES2 = 1 — GLES2渲染后端。它在移动设备上使用OpenGL ES 2.0，在桌面平台上使用OpenGL 2.1，在网络上使用WebGL 1.0。

trans-unit.source: VIDEO_DRIVER_GLES3 = 0 — The GLES3 rendering backend. It uses OpenGL ES 3.0 on mobile devices, OpenGL 3.3 on desktop platforms and WebGL 2.0 on the web.
trans-unit.target: VIDEO_DRIVER_GLES3 = 0 — GLES3渲染后端。它在移动设备上使用OpenGL ES 3.0，在桌面平台上使用OpenGL 3.3，在网络上使用WebGL 2.0。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_CLEAR_ALWAYS = 0 — The viewport is always cleared before drawing.
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_CLEAR_ALWAYS = 0 —始终在绘制之前清除视口。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_CLEAR_NEVER = 1 — The viewport is never cleared before drawing.
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_CLEAR_NEVER = 1-绘制之前永远不会清除视口。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_CLEAR_ONLY_NEXT_FRAME = 2 — The viewport is cleared once, then the clear mode is set to VIEWPORT_CLEAR_NEVER.
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_CLEAR_ONLY_NEXT_FRAME = 2 —清除一次视口，然后将清除模式设置为VIEWPORT_CLEAR_NEVER。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_DEBUG_DRAW_DISABLED = 0 — Debug draw is disabled. Default setting.
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_DEBUG_DRAW_DISABLED = 0-禁用调试绘图。默认设置。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_DEBUG_DRAW_OVERDRAW = 2 — Overwrites clear color to (0,0,0,0).
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_DEBUG_DRAW_OVERDRAW = 2-将透明颜色覆盖为 (0,0,0,0) 。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_DEBUG_DRAW_UNSHADED = 1 — Debug draw sets objects to unshaded.
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_DEBUG_DRAW_UNSHADED = 1-调试绘图将对象设置为不着色。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_DEBUG_DRAW_WIREFRAME = 3 — Debug draw draws objects in wireframe.
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_DEBUG_DRAW_WIREFRAME = 3-调试绘制以线框形式绘制对象。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_MSAA_16X = 4 — Multisample antialiasing is set to 16X.
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_MSAA_16X = 4-多采样抗锯齿设置为16X。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_MSAA_2X = 1 — Multisample antialiasing is set to 2X.
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_MSAA_2X = 1-多重采样抗锯齿设置为2X。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_MSAA_4X = 2 — Multisample antialiasing is set to 4X.
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_MSAA_4X = 2-多采样抗锯齿设置为4X。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_MSAA_8X = 3 — Multisample antialiasing is set to 8X.
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_MSAA_8X = 3-多重采样抗锯齿设置为8X。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_MSAA_DISABLED = 0 — Multisample antialiasing is disabled.
trans-unit.target: VIEWPORT_MSAA_DISABLED = 0-禁用多样本抗锯齿。

trans-unit.source: VIEWPORT_USAGE_2D_NO_SAMPLING = 1 — The Viewport does not render 3D and does not sample.

trans-unit.source: VISIBILITY_TOUCHSCREEN_ONLY = 1 — Visible on touch screens only.
trans-unit.target: VISIBILITY_TOUCHSCREEN_ONLY = 1-仅在触摸屏上可见。

trans-unit.source: WARNING: Deserialized object can contain code which gets executed. Do not use this option if the serialized object comes from untrusted sources to avoid potential security threats (remote code execution).
trans-unit.target: 警告：反序列化的对象可以包含要执行的代码。如果序列化的对象来自不受信任的来源，请不要使用此选项，以避免潜在的安全威胁（远程执行代码）。

trans-unit.source: WRITE = 2 — Opens the file for write operations. Create it if the file does not exist and truncate if it exists.
trans-unit.target: WRITE = 2-打开文件进行写操作。如果文件不存在，则创建它，如果存在，则截断它。

trans-unit.source: WRITE_MODE_BINARY = 1 — Specify that WebSockets messages should be transferred as binary payload (any byte combination is allowed).
trans-unit.target: WRITE_MODE_BINARY = 1-指定应将WebSockets消息作为二进制有效负载传输（允许任何字节组合）。

trans-unit.source: WRITE_MODE_TEXT = 0 — Specify that WebSockets messages should be transferred as text payload (only valid UTF-8 is allowed).
trans-unit.target: WRITE_MODE_TEXT = 0 —指定应将WebSockets消息作为文本有效内容传输（仅允许有效的UTF-8）。

trans-unit.source: WRITE_READ = 7 — Opens the file for read and write operations. Create it if the file does not exist and truncate if it exists.
trans-unit.target: WRITE_READ = 7 —打开文件进行读写操作。如果文件不存在，则创建它，如果存在，则截断它。

trans-unit.source: A +add animation to blend with when the blend amount is in the [0.0, 1.0] range
trans-unit.target: 当混合量在 [0.0, 1.0] 范围内时，可以添加+ add动画

trans-unit.source: A +blend animation to blend with when the blend amount is in the [0.0, 1.0] range
trans-unit.target: 当混合量在 [0.0, 1.0] 范围内时，要混合的+混合动画

trans-unit.source: A -add animation to blend with when the blend amount is in the [-1.0, 0.0] range.
trans-unit.target: 当混合量在 [-1.0, 0.0] 范围内时，将添加一个-add动画。

trans-unit.source: A -blend animation to blend with when the blend amount is in the [-1.0, 0.0] range.
trans-unit.target: 当混合量在 [-1.0, 0.0] 范围内时，将与-blend动画进行混合。

trans-unit.source: A .stex texture.
trans-unit.target: 一个.stex纹理。

trans-unit.source: A 2D game object, parent of all 2D related nodes. Has a position, rotation, scale and Z-index.
trans-unit.target: 一个2D游戏对象,所有2D相关节点的父节点。具有位置、旋转、比例和Z-index。

trans-unit.source: A 2D game object, with a position, rotation and scale. All 2D physics nodes and sprites inherit from Node2D. Use Node2D as a parent node to move, scale and rotate children in a 2D project. Also gives control on the node’s render order.
trans-unit.target: 具有位置，旋转和比例的2D游戏对象。所有2D物理节点和子画面都继承自Node2D。使用Node2D作为父节点在2D项目中移动，缩放和旋转子级。还可以控制节点的渲染顺序。

trans-unit.source: A 2D line.
trans-unit.target: 一条二维线。

trans-unit.source: A 2D polygon.
trans-unit.target: 一个二维多边形。

trans-unit.source: A 6-sided 3D texture typically used for faking reflections. It can be used to make an object look as if it’s reflecting its surroundings. This usually delivers much better performance than other reflection methods.
trans-unit.target: 通常用于伪造反射的6面3D纹理。它可用于使对象看起来像是在反映周围的环境。通常提供比其他反射方法更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: A Container node that holds a Viewport, automatically setting its size.
trans-unit.target: 一个拥有Viewport的Container节点，它会自动设置其大小。

trans-unit.source: A Curve2D describing the path.
trans-unit.target: 描述路径的Curve2D。

trans-unit.source: A Curve3D describing the path.
trans-unit.target: 描述路径的Curve3D。

trans-unit.source: A Resource that contains vertex-array based geometry.
trans-unit.target: 甲资源包含基于顶点的阵列几何形状。

trans-unit.source: A Texture based on an Image.
trans-unit.target: 甲纹理基于一个图像。

trans-unit.source: A Texture based on an Image. Can be created from an Image with create_from_image.
trans-unit.target: 甲纹理基于一个图像。可以使用create_from_image从映像创建。

trans-unit.source: A Variant containing the parsed JSON. Use typeof() to check if it is what you expect. For example, if JSON source starts with curly braces ({}) a Dictionary will be returned, if JSON source starts with braces ([]) an Array will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 甲变体包含解析JSON。使用typeof（）检查它是否符合您的期望。例如，如果JSON源以大括号（ {} ）开头，则将返回Dictionary；如果JSON源以大括号（ [] ）开头，则将返回Array。

trans-unit.source: A Vector2 array with the index for polygon’s vertices positions. Note that the returned value is a copy of the underlying array, rather than a reference.
trans-unit.target: 一个Vector2数组，带有用于多边形顶点位置的索引。请注意，返回值是基础数组的副本，而不是引用。

trans-unit.source: A HTTPClient should be reused between multiple requests or to connect to different hosts instead of creating one client per request. Supports SSL and SSL server certificate verification. HTTP status codes in the 2xx range indicate success, 3xx redirection (i.e. “try again, but over here”), 4xx something was wrong with the request, and 5xx something went wrong on the server’s side.
trans-unit.target: 甲 HTTPClient 应的多个请求之间被重新使用，或连接到不同的主机，而不是创建每个请求一个客户端。支持SSL和SSL服务器证书验证。2xx范围内的HTTP状态代码表示成功，3xx重定向（即“重试，但在这里重试”），4xx请求有问题，服务器端有5xx问题。

trans-unit.source: A NodePath is composed of a list of slash-separated node names (like a filesystem path) and an optional colon-separated list of “subnames” which can be resources or properties.
trans-unit.target: 甲 NodePath 由斜线分开的节点名（如文件系统路径）和“子名”，其可以是资源或属性的一个可选冒号分隔的列表的列表。

trans-unit.source: A signal can only be connected once to a method. It will throw an error if already connected, unless the signal was connected with CONNECT_REFERENCE_COUNTED. To avoid this, first, use is_connected to check for existing connections.
trans-unit.target: 甲 signal 只能连接到一次一个 method 。如果已经连接，它将抛出错误，除非信号已通过CONNECT_REFERENCE_COUNTED连接。为避免这种情况，首先，使用is_connected检查现有连接。

trans-unit.source: A Blend2 Node blends two animations with the amount between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 一个Blend2节点将两个动画混合,数量在0和1之间。

trans-unit.source: A Blend3 Node blends three animations with the amount between -1 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 一个Blend3节点以-1和1之间的数量混合三个动画。

trans-unit.source: A Blend4 Node blends two pairs of animations.
trans-unit.target: 一个Blend4节点融合了两对动画。

trans-unit.source: A CSG Box shape.
trans-unit.target: 一个CSG盒子形状。

trans-unit.source: A CSG Cylinder shape.
trans-unit.target: A CSG圆柱形。

trans-unit.source: A CSG Mesh shape that uses a mesh resource.
trans-unit.target: 一个使用网格资源的CSG网格形状。

trans-unit.source: A CSG Sphere shape.
trans-unit.target: 一个CSG球体形状。

trans-unit.source: A CSG Torus shape.
trans-unit.target: 一个CSG环形。

trans-unit.source: A CSG node that allows you to combine other CSG modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 一个CSG节点,允许您结合其他CSG修饰符。

trans-unit.source: A CanvasItem can also be hidden, which will also hide its children. It provides many ways to change parameters such as modulation (for itself and its children) and self modulation (only for itself), as well as its blend mode.
trans-unit.target: 一个CanvasItem也可以被隐藏,这也将隐藏它的子项目。它提供了许多改变参数的方法,如调制(对它自己和它的子项目)和自调制(只对它自己),以及它的混合模式。

trans-unit.source: A Control can inherit this to create custom container classes.
trans-unit.target: Control可以继承这个来创建自定义的容器类。

trans-unit.source: A CubeMap is a 6 sided 3D texture.
trans-unit.target: CubeMap是一个6面的3D纹理。

trans-unit.source: A GraphNode is a container defined by a title. It can have 1 or more input and output slots, which can be enabled (shown) or disabled (not shown) and have different (incompatible) types. Colors can also be assigned to slots. A tuple of input and output slots is defined for each GUI element included in the GraphNode. Input and output connections are left and right slots, but only enabled slots are counted as connections.
trans-unit.target: 一个GraphNode是一个由标题定义的容器,它可以有1个或多个输入和输出槽,可以启用(如图所示)或禁用(如图所示),并有不同的(不兼容)类型。它可以有1个或多个输入和输出槽,这些槽可以被启用(显示)或禁用(未显示),并具有不同(不兼容)的类型。颜色也可以分配给插槽。输入和输出插槽的元组是为GraphNode中包含的每个GUI元素定义的。输入和输出连接是左槽和右槽,但只有启用的槽才算作连接。

trans-unit.source: A GraphNode is a container with several input and output slots allowing connections between GraphNodes. Slots can have different, incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: 一个GraphNode是一个具有多个输入和输出插槽的容器,允许GraphNode之间的连接。槽可以有不同的、不兼容的类型。

trans-unit.source: A GridMap contains a collection of cells. Each grid cell refers to a MeshLibrary item. All cells in the map have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: GridMap包含单元格的集合。每个网格单元都引用一个MeshLibrary项目。地图中的所有单元格都具有相同的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: A GridMap is split into a sparse collection of octants for efficient rendering and physics processing. Every octant has the same dimensions and can contain several cells.
trans-unit.target: GridMap被分割成一个稀疏的八位数集合,以实现高效的渲染和物理处理。每个八角形都有相同的尺寸,可以包含多个单元。

trans-unit.source: A Mix node adds input b to input a by a the amount given by ratio.
trans-unit.target: 混合节点将输入b添加到输入a中,添加量为比率给定的a。

trans-unit.source: A PacketPeer implementation that should be passed to SceneTree.network_peer after being initialized as either a client or server. Events can then be handled by connecting to SceneTree signals.
trans-unit.target: 初始化为客户端或服务器后应传递给SceneTree.network_peer的 PacketPeer实现。然后可以通过连接到SceneTree信号来处理事件。

trans-unit.source: A ParallaxBackground uses one or more ParallaxLayer child nodes to create a parallax effect. Each ParallaxLayer can move at a different speed using ParallaxLayer.motion_offset. This creates an illusion of depth in a 2D game. If not used with a Camera2D, you must manually calculate the scroll_offset.
trans-unit.target: ParallaxBackground使用一个或多个ParallaxLayer子节点来创建视差效果。每个ParallaxLayer可以使用ParallaxLayer.motion_offset以不同的速度移动。这会在2D游戏中造成深度错觉。如果未与Camera2D一起使用，则必须手动计算scroll_offset。

trans-unit.source: A ParallaxLayer must be the child of a ParallaxBackground node. Each ParallaxLayer can be set to move at different speeds relative to the camera movement or the ParallaxBackground.scroll_offset value.
trans-unit.target: ParallaxLayer必须是ParallaxBackground节点的子级。可以将每个ParallaxLayer设置为相对于相机移动或ParallaxBackground.scroll_offset值以不同的速度移动。

trans-unit.source: A Polygon2D is defined by a set of points. Each point is connected to the next, with the final point being connected to the first, resulting in a closed polygon. Polygon2Ds can be filled with color (solid or gradient) or filled with a given texture.
trans-unit.target: 一个多边形2D是由一组点定义的。每个点与下一个点相连,最后一个点与第一个点相连,从而形成一个封闭的多边形。Polygon2Ds可以用颜色(纯色或渐变)来填充,也可以用给定的纹理来填充。

trans-unit.source: A RayCast represents a line from its origin to its destination position, cast_to. It is used to query the 2D space in order to find the closest object along the path of the ray.
trans-unit.target: RayCast代表一条从其起点到其目的地位置 cast_to 的线。它用于查询2D空间，以便沿着射线路径找到最近的对象。

trans-unit.source: A RayCast represents a line from its origin to its destination position, cast_to. It is used to query the 3D space in order to find the closest object along the path of the ray.
trans-unit.target: RayCast代表一条从其起点到其目的地位置 cast_to 的线。它用于查询3D空间，以便沿着射线路径找到最近的对象。

trans-unit.source: A RigidBody has 4 behavior modes: Rigid, Static, Character, and Kinematic.
trans-unit.target: RigidBody具有4个行为模式 s：刚性，静态，字符和运动。

trans-unit.source: A RigidBody2D has 4 behavior modes: Rigid, Static, Character, and Kinematic.
trans-unit.target: RigidBody2D具有4个行为模式 s：刚性，静态，字符和运动。

trans-unit.source: A ScrollContainer node meant to contain a Control child. ScrollContainers will automatically create a scrollbar child (HScrollBar, VScrollBar, or both) when needed and will only draw the Control within the ScrollContainer area. Scrollbars will automatically be drawn at the right (for vertical) or bottom (for horizontal) and will enable dragging to move the viewable Control (and its children) within the ScrollContainer. Scrollbars will also automatically resize the grabber based on the minimum_size of the Control relative to the ScrollContainer. Works great with a Panel control. You can set EXPAND on children size flags, so they will upscale to ScrollContainer size if ScrollContainer size is bigger (scroll is invisible for chosen dimension).
trans-unit.target: 旨在包含Control子级的ScrollContainer节点。ScrollContainers将在需要时自动创建一个滚动条子项（HScrollBar，VScrollBar或两者），并且仅在ScrollContainer区域内绘制控件。滚动条将自动在右侧（垂直）或底部（水平）绘制，并允许拖动以在ScrollContainer中移动可见控件（及其子控件）。滚动条还将根据控件相对于ScrollContainer的minimum_size自动调整抓取器的大小。与面板完美搭配控制。您可以在子尺寸标记上设置EXPAND，这样，如果ScrollContainer尺寸较大（滚动对于选定的尺寸不可见），它们将放大到ScrollContainer尺寸。

trans-unit.source: A Singleton that deals with inputs.
trans-unit.target: 一个处理输入的Singleton。

trans-unit.source: A Singleton that deals with inputs. This includes key presses, mouse buttons and movement, joypads, and input actions. Actions and their events can be set in the Project Settings / Input Map tab. Or be set with InputMap.
trans-unit.target: 处理输入的Singleton。这包括按键，鼠标按钮和移动，操纵杆以及输入操作。可以在“项目设置” /“输入映射”选项卡中设置动作及其事件。或使用InputMap进行设置。

trans-unit.source: A SpotLight light is a type of Light node that emits lights in a specific direction, in the shape of a cone. The light is attenuated through the distance and this attenuation can be configured by changing the energy, radius and attenuation parameters of Light.
trans-unit.target: SpotLight灯光是一种Light节点，它在特定方向上呈圆锥形发光。光会在远处衰减，并且可以通过更改Light的能量，半径和衰减参数来配置该衰减。

trans-unit.source: A Texture capable of storing many smaller Textures with offsets.
trans-unit.target: 一个能够存储许多带有偏移量的小纹理的纹理。

trans-unit.source: A TileSet is a library of tiles for a TileMap. It contains a list of tiles, each consisting of a sprite and optional collision shapes.
trans-unit.target: TileSet是TileMap的图块库。它包含一个图块列表，每个图块均包含一个精灵和可选的碰撞形状。

trans-unit.source: A Variant takes up only 20 bytes and can store almost any engine datatype inside of it. Variants are rarely used to hold information for long periods of time. Instead, they are used mainly for communication, editing, serialization and moving data around.
trans-unit.target: 一个Variant只占20个字节,几乎可以在里面存储任何引擎数据类型。Variant很少用来长时间保存信息,而是主要用于通信、编辑、序列化和移动数据。相反,它们主要用于通信、编辑、序列化和移动数据。

trans-unit.source: A Variant:
trans-unit.target: 一个变种。

trans-unit.source: A Viewport creates a different view into the screen, or a sub-view inside another viewport. Children 2D Nodes will display on it, and children Camera 3D nodes will render on it too.
trans-unit.target: 一个视口可以在屏幕中创建一个不同的视图,或者在另一个视口中创建一个子视图。子女的2D节点将在其上显示,子女的Camera 3D节点也将在其上渲染。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Script node representing a constant from base types, such as Vector3.AXIS_X.
trans-unit.target: 一个Visual Script节点，表示基本类型（例如Vector3.AXIS_X）中的常量。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Script node representing a constant from the base types.
trans-unit.target: 一个Visual Script节点,代表基本类型中的一个常量。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Script node returning a singleton from @GlobalScope
trans-unit.target: 从@GlobalScope返回单例的Visual Script节点

trans-unit.source: A Visual Script node that checks a bool input port. If true, it will exit via the “true” sequence port. If false, it will exit via the “false” sequence port. After exiting either, it exits via the “done” port. Sequence ports may be left disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查布尔输入端口的Visual Script节点。如果为 true ，它将通过“ true”序列端口退出。如果为 false ，它将通过“ false”序列端口退出。退出后，它通过“完成”端口退出。序列端口可以保持断开状态。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Script node used to annotate the script.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于注释脚本的Visual Script节点。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Script node used to call built-in functions.
trans-unit.target: 一个Visual Script节点,用于调用内置函数。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Script node used to display annotations in the script, so that code may be documented.
trans-unit.target: 一个Visual Script节点,用于显示脚本中的注释,这样代码就可以被记录下来。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Script node which branches the flow.
trans-unit.target: 一个Visual Script节点,它是流程的分支。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Script node which calls a base type constructor.
trans-unit.target: 一个Visual Script节点,它调用一个基本类型构造函数。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Script node which calls a base type constructor. It can be used for type conversion as well.
trans-unit.target: 一个Visual Script节点,它调用一个基本类型构造函数。它也可以用于类型转换。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Script node which deconstructs a base type instance into its parts.
trans-unit.target: 一个Visual Script节点,它将一个基本类型实例分解为其各个部分。

trans-unit.source: A WebSocket client implementation
trans-unit.target: WebSocket客户端实现

trans-unit.source: A WebSocket server implementation
trans-unit.target: WebSocket服务器实现

trans-unit.source: A body that is controlled by the 2D physics engine.
trans-unit.target: 一个由2D物理引擎控制的身体。

trans-unit.source: A built-in function used inside a VisualScript. It is usually a math function or an utility function.
trans-unit.target: VisualScript内部使用的内置函数。通常是数学函数或实用函数。

trans-unit.source: A camera node with a few overrules for AR/VR applied, such as location tracking.
trans-unit.target: 一个摄像机节点,应用了一些AR/VR的过度规则,比如位置跟踪。

trans-unit.source: A checkbox allows the user to make a binary choice (choosing only one of two possible options), for example Answer ‘yes’ or ‘no’.
trans-unit.target: 复选框允许用户做出二进制选择（仅选择两个可能的选项之一），例如，回答“是”或“否”。

trans-unit.source: A class for generating pseudo-random numbers.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于生成伪随机数的类。

trans-unit.source: A class representing a specific WebSocket connection.
trans-unit.target: 代表特定 WebSocket 连接的类。

trans-unit.source: A class stored as a resource.
trans-unit.target: 作为资源存储的类。

trans-unit.source: A class stored as a resource. A script exends the functionality of all objects that instance it.
trans-unit.target: 作为资源存储的一个类。脚本扩展了所有实例对象的功能。

trans-unit.source: A class that stores an expression you can execute.
trans-unit.target: 一个存储你可以执行的表达式的类。

trans-unit.source: A color is represented by red, green, and blue (r, g, b) components. Additionally, a represents the alpha component, often used for transparency. Values are in floating point and usually range from 0 to 1. Some properties (such as CanvasItem.modulate) may accept values > 1.
trans-unit.target: 颜色由红色，绿色和蓝色 (r, g, b) 成分表示。此外， a 表示通常用于透明度的alpha分量。值在浮点中，通常为0到1。某些属性（例如CanvasItem.modulate）可以接受> 1的值。

trans-unit.source: A color value that gets multiplied on, could be used for mood-coloring or to simulate the color of light.
trans-unit.target: 一个被乘上的颜色值,可以用于心情着色或模拟光的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A contact is detected if object A is in any of the layers that object B scans, or object B is in any layer scanned by object A.
trans-unit.target: 如果物体A在物体B扫描的任何一层中,或者物体B在物体A扫描的任何一层中,则检测到接触。

trans-unit.source: A controller id of 0 is unbound and will always result in an inactive node. Controller id 1 is reserved for the first controller that identifies itself as the left hand controller and id 2 is reserved for the first controller that identifies itself as the right hand controller.
trans-unit.target: 控制器id为0是未绑定的,将始终导致一个不活动的节点。控制器id 1保留给第一个自认为是左手控制器的控制器,id 2保留给第一个自认为是右手控制器的控制器。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the canvas item will be drawn with a local offset of the mirroring Vector2.
trans-unit.target: 将使用镜像Vector2的局部偏移绘制画布项目的副本。

trans-unit.source: A countdown timer.
trans-unit.target: 一个倒计时的计时器。

trans-unit.source: A curve that can be saved and re-used for other objects. By default it ranges between 0 and 1 on the y-axis and positions points relative to the 0.5 y-position.
trans-unit.target: 可以保存并重新用于其他对象的曲线。默认情况下，它在y轴上的范围是 0 到 1 ，并且相对于 0.5 y位置定位点。

trans-unit.source: A custom Visual Script node which can be scripted in powerful ways.
trans-unit.target: 一个自定义的Visual Script节点,它可以用强大的方式来编写脚本。

trans-unit.source: A custom shader program.
trans-unit.target: 一个自定义的着色器程序。

trans-unit.source: A deformable physics body. Used to create elastic or deformable objects such as cloth, rubber, or other flexible materials.
trans-unit.target: 一种可变形的物理体。用于制造弹性或可变形的物体,如布、橡胶或其他柔性材料。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of named groups and its corresponding group number. Only groups with that were matched are included. If multiple groups have the same name, that name would refer to the first matching one.
trans-unit.target: 已命名的组及其相应组号的字典。只包括与之匹配的组。如果多个组有相同的名称,该名称将指第一个匹配的组。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary representation of the scene contents.
trans-unit.target: 场景内容的字典表示。

trans-unit.source: A direct reference to a node.
trans-unit.target: 对一个节点的直接引用。

trans-unit.source: A directional light is a type of Light node that models an infinite number of parallel rays covering the entire scene. It is used for lights with strong intensity that are located far away from the scene to model sunlight or moonlight. The worldspace location of the DirectionalLight transform (origin) is ignored. Only the basis is used do determine light direction.
trans-unit.target: 定向光源是一种光源节点，可以对覆盖整个场景的无限数量的平行光线进行建模。它用于远离场景的强光照明，以模拟阳光或月光。DirectionalLight变换（起点）的世界空间位置将被忽略。仅使用依据来确定光的方向。

trans-unit.source: A directory for the resource filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 资源文件系统的目录。

trans-unit.source: A disabled collision shape has no effect in the world.
trans-unit.target: 被禁用的碰撞形状对世界没有影响。

trans-unit.source: A factor applied to the all rotation across axes orthogonal to the slider.
trans-unit.target: 适用于所有与滑块正交的轴的旋转的系数。

trans-unit.source: A factor applied to the all rotation in the limits.
trans-unit.target: 应用于极限中所有旋转的系数。

trans-unit.source: A factor applied to the all rotation once the limit is surpassed.
trans-unit.target: 一旦超过极限,适用于所有旋转的系数。

trans-unit.source: A factor applied to the movement across axes orthogonal to the slider.
trans-unit.target: 一个应用于在与滑块正交的轴上移动的系数。

trans-unit.source: A factor applied to the movement across the slider axis as long as the slider is in the limits. The lower, the slower the movement.
trans-unit.target: 只要滑块在极限范围内,就应用于滑块轴上的运动的系数。越低,移动速度越慢。

trans-unit.source: A factor applied to the movement across the slider axis once the limits get surpassed. The lower, the slower the movement.
trans-unit.target: 当超过极限时,应用于滑块轴运动的系数。越低,运动越慢。

trans-unit.source: A factor applied to the movement across the x-axis The lower, the slower the movement.
trans-unit.target: 适用于X轴上的运动的系数,越低,运动越慢。

trans-unit.source: A factor applied to the movement across the y-axis The lower, the slower the movement.
trans-unit.target: 应用于Y轴上的运动的系数,越低,运动越慢。

trans-unit.source: A factor applied to the movement across the z-axis The lower, the slower the movement.
trans-unit.target: 一个应用于Z轴运动的系数,越低,运动越慢。

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating that the animation must loop. This is uses for correct interpolation of animation cycles, and for hinting the player that it must restart the animation.
trans-unit.target: 表示动画必须循环的标志。用于正确的动画循环插值,并提示玩家必须重新开始动画。

trans-unit.source: A helper node for displaying scrollable elements (e.g. lists).
trans-unit.target: 一个用于显示可滚动元素(如列表)的辅助节点。

trans-unit.source: A high-level network interface to simplify multiplayer interactions.
trans-unit.target: 一个高级网络接口,以简化多人互动。

trans-unit.source: A higher value means more of the source texture is considered to be part of the bottom border of the 3x3 box.
trans-unit.target: 较高的值意味着更多的源纹理被认为是3x3框的底部边界的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A higher value means more of the source texture is considered to be part of the left border of the 3x3 box.
trans-unit.target: 较高的值意味着更多的源纹理被认为是3x3框的左边界的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A higher value means more of the source texture is considered to be part of the right border of the 3x3 box.
trans-unit.target: 较高的值意味着更多的源纹理被认为是3x3框的右边界的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A higher value means more of the source texture is considered to be part of the top border of the 3x3 box.
trans-unit.target: 较高的值意味着更多的源纹理被认为是3x3框的顶部边界的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A hinge between two 3D bodies.
trans-unit.target: 两个3D体之间的铰链。

trans-unit.source: A limiter is similar to a compressor, but it’s less flexible and designed to disallow sound going over a given dB threshold. Adding one in the Master Bus is always recommended to reduce the effects of clipping.
trans-unit.target: 限制器类似于压缩器，但灵活性较差，并且设计为不允许声音超过给定的dB阈值。始终建议在主总线中添加一个以减少裁剪的影响。

trans-unit.source: A line through several points in 2D space.
trans-unit.target: 通过二维空间中的几个点的线。

trans-unit.source: A list of built-in visual script functions, see VisualScriptBuiltinFunc and VisualScript.
trans-unit.target: 内置的可视脚本功能列表，请参见VisualScriptBuiltinFunc和VisualScript。

trans-unit.source: A lower damping value allows a rotation initiated by body A to travel to body B slower.
trans-unit.target: 较低的阻尼值可以使由A体发起的旋转较慢地传到B体。

trans-unit.source: A material for CanvasItems.
trans-unit.target: CanvasItem的材料。

trans-unit.source: A material for physics properties.
trans-unit.target: 物理性能的材料。

trans-unit.source: A material that uses a custom Shader program to render either items to screen or process particles. You can create multiple materials for the same shader but configure different values for the uniforms defined in the shader.
trans-unit.target: 一种使用自定义Shader程序渲染项目以筛选或处理粒子的材质。您可以为同一着色器创建多种材质，但可以为着色器中定义的统一配置不同的值。

trans-unit.source: A material that uses a custom Shader program.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义着色器程序的材质。

trans-unit.source: A mathematic curve.
trans-unit.target: 一条数学曲线。

trans-unit.source: A more generalized, low-level variation of the directory concept.
trans-unit.target: 目录概念的一个更概括的、低层次的变化。

trans-unit.source: A negative item index will clear the cell.
trans-unit.target: 负数的项目索引将清除单元格。

trans-unit.source: A negative value will result in the vehicle reversing.
trans-unit.target: 负值将导致车辆倒车。

trans-unit.source: A node graph tool for blending multiple animations bound to an AnimationPlayer. Especially useful for animating characters or other skeleton-based rigs. It can combine several animations to form a desired pose.
trans-unit.target: 一个节点图工具，用于混合绑定到AnimationPlayer的多个动画。对动画角色或其他基于骨骼的装备特别有用。它可以组合多个动画以形成所需的姿势。

trans-unit.source: A node that displays 2D texture information in a 3D environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个在3D环境中显示2D纹理信息的节点。

trans-unit.source: A node that displays a 2D texture in a 3D environment. The texture displayed can be a region from a larger atlas texture, or a frame from a sprite sheet animation.
trans-unit.target: 在3D环境中显示2D纹理的节点。显示的纹理可以是更大的图集纹理中的一个区域,也可以是精灵片动画中的一帧。

trans-unit.source: A node that displays a 2D texture. The texture displayed can be a region from a larger atlas texture, or a frame from a sprite sheet animation.
trans-unit.target: 一个显示2D纹理的节点。显示的纹理可以是更大的图集纹理中的一个区域,也可以是精灵片动画中的一帧。

trans-unit.source: A node that has methods to draw outlines or use indices of vertices to create navigation polygons.
trans-unit.target: 一个节点,它具有绘制轮廓或使用顶点的指数来创建导航多边形的方法。

trans-unit.source: A node that will attach to a bone.
trans-unit.target: 一个会附着在骨头上的结点。

trans-unit.source: A node used to create a parallax scrolling background.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建视差滚动背景的节点。

trans-unit.source: A node which is part of a VisualScript.
trans-unit.target: 一个节点，它是VisualScript的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A node which is part of a VisualScript. Not to be confused with Node, which is a part of a SceneTree.
trans-unit.target: 一个节点，它是VisualScript的一部分。不要与Node混淆，后者是SceneTree的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A node with the ability to send HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 一个具有发送HTTP请求能力的节点。

trans-unit.source: A node with the ability to send HTTP requests. Uses HTTPClient internally.

trans-unit.source: A pre-parsed relative or absolute path in a scene tree, for use with Node.get_node and similar functions. It can reference a node, a resource within a node, or a property of a node or resource. For instance, "Path2D/PathFollow2D/Sprite:texture:size" would refer to the size property of the texture resource on the node named "Sprite" which is a child of the other named nodes in the path.
trans-unit.target: 场景树中预先解析的相对或绝对路径，用于Node.get_node和类似功能。它可以引用节点，节点内的资源或节点或资源的属性。例如， "Path2D/PathFollow2D/Sprite:texture:size" 将引用名为 "Sprite" 的节点上 texture 资源的 size 属性，该节点是路径中其他命名节点的子级。

trans-unit.source: A preview that will follow the mouse that should represent the data can be set with set_drag_preview. A good time to set the preview is in this method.

trans-unit.source: A shortcut for binding input.
trans-unit.target: 绑定输入的快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: A simplified interface to a scene file. Provides access to operations and checks that can be performed on the scene resource itself.
trans-unit.target: 一个简化的场景文件的界面,提供对场景资源本身的操作和检查。提供对场景资源本身的操作和检查的访问。

trans-unit.source: A soft mesh physics body.
trans-unit.target: 软网物理体。

trans-unit.source: A spatial node representing a spatially tracked controller.
trans-unit.target: 一个空间节点代表一个空间跟踪的控制器。

trans-unit.source: A static body can also be animated by using simulated motion mode. This is useful for implementing functionalities such as moving platforms. When this mode is active the body can be animated and automatically computes linear and angular velocity to apply in that frame and to influence other bodies.
trans-unit.target: 静态体也可以通过使用模拟运动模式来制作动画。这对于实现移动平台等功能非常有用。当该模式激活时,体可以被动画化,并自动计算线性和角速度以应用于该帧并影响其他体。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization Mutex.
trans-unit.target: 一个同步Mutex。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization Mutex. Element used to synchronize multiple Threads. Basically a binary Semaphore. Guarantees that only one thread can ever acquire this lock at a time. Can be used to protect a critical section. Be careful to avoid deadlocks.
trans-unit.target: 同步Mutex。用于同步多个Thread的元素。基本上是二进制信号量。确保一次只有一个线程可以获取此锁。可用于保护关键部分。小心避免死锁。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization Semaphore.
trans-unit.target: 一个同步的Semaphore。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization Semaphore. Element used to synchronize multiple Threads. Initialized to zero on creation. Be careful to avoid deadlocks. For a binary version, see Mutex.
trans-unit.target: 同步信号量。用于同步多个Thread的元素。创建时初始化为零。小心避免死锁。有关二进制版本，请参见Mutex。

trans-unit.source: A texture that is loaded from a .stex file.
trans-unit.target: 从.stex文件加载的纹理。

trans-unit.source: A texture that shows a curve.
trans-unit.target: 一种显示曲线的纹理。

trans-unit.source: A texture works by registering an image in the video hardware, which then can be used in 3D models or 2D Sprite or GUI Control.
trans-unit.target: 纹理通过在视频硬件中注册图像来工作，然后可以将其用于3D模型或2D Sprite或GUI Control中。

trans-unit.source: A tracked object
trans-unit.target: 被跟踪物体

trans-unit.source: A tree of nodes is called a scene. Scenes can be saved to the disk and then instanced into other scenes. This allows for very high flexibility in the architecture and data model of Godot projects.
trans-unit.target: 一棵节点树称为场景。场景可以保存到磁盘，然后实例化为其他场景。这使Godot项目的体系结构和数据模型具有很高的灵活性。

trans-unit.source: A twist joint between two 3D bodies.
trans-unit.target: 两个三维体之间的扭转连接。

trans-unit.source: A two-dimensional array of boolean values, can be used to efficiently store a binary matrix (every matrix element takes only one bit) and query the values using natural cartesian coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 布尔值的二维数组,可以用来有效地存储二进制矩阵(每个矩阵元素只占一个位),并使用自然的卡提斯坐标查询数值。

trans-unit.source: A type of Sky used to draw a background texture.
trans-unit.target: 天空的一种类型，用于绘制背景纹理。

trans-unit.source: A unit of execution in a process.
trans-unit.target: 流程中的一个执行单位。

trans-unit.source: A unit of execution in a process. Can run methods on Objects simultaneously. The use of synchronization via Mutex, Semaphore is advised if working with shared objects.
trans-unit.target: 流程中的执行单位。可以同时在Object上运行方法。如果使用共享对象，建议通过Mutex，Semaphore使用同步。

trans-unit.source: A unit quaternion used for representing 3D rotations.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示三维旋转的单位四元数。

trans-unit.source: A weak reference to an object is not enough to keep the object alive: when the only remaining references to a referent are weak references, garbage collection is free to destroy the referent and reuse its memory for something else. However, until the object is actually destroyed the weak reference may return the object even if there are no strong references to it.
trans-unit.target: 对一个对象的弱引用不足以让这个对象存活下去:当对一个引用的唯一剩余引用是弱引用时,垃圾回收可以自由地销毁这个引用,并将它的内存重新用于其他东西。然而,在对象真正被销毁之前,即使没有强引用,弱引用也可以返回对象。

trans-unit.source: A weakref can hold a Reference, without contributing to the reference counter. A weakref can be created from an Object using @GDScript.weakref. If this object is not a reference, weakref still works, however, it does not have any effect on the object. Weakrefs are useful in cases where multiple classes have variables that refer to each other. Without weakrefs, using these classes could lead to memory leaks, since both references keep each other from being released. Making part of the variables a weakref can prevent this cyclic dependency, and allows the references to be released.
trans-unit.target: 弱引用可以保存引用，而无需增加引用计数器。可以使用@ GDScript.weakref从对象创建一个weakref。如果该对象不是引用，则weakref仍然有效，但是，它对该对象没有任何影响。在多个类具有相互引用的变量的情况下，弱引用很有用。如果没有weakrefs，则使用这些类可能会导致内存泄漏，因为两个引用会使彼此不被释放。将变量的一部分设为weakref可以防止这种循环依赖性，并允许释放引用。

trans-unit.source: A* (A star) is a computer algorithm that is widely used in pathfinding and graph traversal, the process of plotting an efficiently directed path between multiple points. It enjoys widespread use due to its performance and accuracy. Godot’s A* implementation make use of vectors as points.
trans-unit.target: A *（星形）是一种计算机算法，广泛用于路径查找和图形遍历，该过程是绘制多个点之间有效指向的路径的过程。由于其性能和准确性，它得到了广泛的应用。Godot的A *实现使用向量作为点。

trans-unit.target: 基于流协议的抽象和基类。

trans-unit.source: Accelerates the vehicle by applying an engine force. The vehicle is only speed up if the wheels that have VehicleWheel.use_as_traction set to true and are in contact with a surface. The RigidBody.mass of the vehicle has an effect on the acceleration of the vehicle. For a vehicle with a mass set to 1000, try a value in the 25 - 50 range for acceleration. Note that the simulation does not take the effect of gears into account, you will need to add logic for this if you wish to simulate gears.
trans-unit.target: 通过施加发动机力来加速车辆。仅当将VehicleWheel.use_as_traction设置为 true 并与表面接触的车轮时，车辆才会加速。车辆的RigidBody.mass质量会影响车辆的加速度。对于质量设置为1000的车辆，请尝试在25-50范围内的值进行加速。请注意，模拟并未考虑齿轮的影响，如果要模拟齿轮，则需要为此添加逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Accentuates transients by using a wider attack, making effects sound more punchy.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用更宽的攻击来突出瞬态,使效果听起来更有冲击力。

trans-unit.target: AcceptDialog

trans-unit.source: Accepts unhandled InputEvents. click_position is the clicked location in world space and click_normal is the normal vector extending from the clicked surface of the Shape at shape_idx. Connect to the input_event signal to easily pick up these events.
trans-unit.target: 接受未处理的InputEvent。 click_position 是在世界空间和点击的位置 click_normal 距离的点击的表面延伸的法线矢量形状在 shape_idx 。连接到 input_event 信号即可轻松接收这些事件。

trans-unit.source: Accepts unhandled InputEvents. Requires input_pickable to be true. shape_idx is the child index of the clicked Shape2D. Connect to the input_event signal to easily pick up these events.
trans-unit.target: 接受未处理的InputEvent。要求input_pickable为 true 。 shape_idx 是单击的Shape2D的子索引。连接到 input_event 信号即可轻松接收这些事件。

trans-unit.source: Activates or deactivates the 2D physics engine.
trans-unit.target: 激活或停用2D物理引擎。

trans-unit.source: Activates or deactivates the 3D physics engine.

trans-unit.source: Add a keyword and its Color.

trans-unit.target: 添加一个名称为“ name”的骨骼。get_bone_count将成为骨骼索引。

trans-unit.source: Add a control to the bottom panel (together with Output, Debug, Animation, etc). Returns a reference to the button added. It’s up to you to hide/show the button when needed. When your plugin is deactivated, make sure to remove your custom control with remove_control_from_bottom_panel and free it with queue_free().
trans-unit.target: 将控件添加到底部面板（以及“输出”，“调试”，“动画”等）。返回对添加的按钮的引用。您可以根据需要隐藏/显示按钮。停用插件后，请确保使用remove_control_from_bottom_panel删除自定义控件，并使用 queue_free() 释放它。

trans-unit.source: Add a custom Visual Script node to the editor. It’ll be placed under “Custom Nodes” with the category as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将自定义Visual Script节点添加到编辑器。它将以 category 作为参数放置在“自定义节点”下。

trans-unit.source: Add a custom control to a container (see CONTAINER_* enum). There are many locations where custom controls can be added in the editor UI.
trans-unit.target: 将自定义控件添加到容器中(参见CONTAINER_*枚举)。在编辑器用户界面中可以添加自定义控件的位置有很多。

trans-unit.source: Add a custom filter. Example: add_filter("*.png ; PNG Images")
trans-unit.target: 添加自定义过滤器。示例： add_filter("*.png ; PNG Images")

trans-unit.source: Add a custom menu to ‘Project > Tools’ as name that calls callback on an instance of handler with a parameter ud when user activates it.
trans-unit.target: 将一个自定义菜单添加到“项目>工具”作为 name ，当用户激活该菜单时使用参数 ud 调用 handler 实例上的 callback 。

trans-unit.source: Add a custom property info to a property. The dictionary must contain: name:String(the name of the property) and type:int(see TYPE_* in @GlobalScope), and optionally hint:int(see PROPERTY_HINT_* in @GlobalScope), hint_string:String.
trans-unit.target: 将自定义属性信息添加到属性。字典必须包含：姓名：字符串（属性的名称）和类型：INT（见TYPE_ *在@GlobalScope），以及可选提示：INT（见PROPERTY_HINT_ *在@GlobalScope），hint_string：字符串。

trans-unit.source: Add a custom signal with the specified name to the VisualScript.
trans-unit.target: 在VisualScript中添加具有指定名称的自定义信号。

trans-unit.source: Add a custom type, which will appear in the list of nodes or resources. An icon can be optionally passed.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个自定义类型,它将出现在节点或资源的列表中。可以选择传递一个图标。

trans-unit.source: Add a function with the specified name to the VisualScript.
trans-unit.target: 在VisualScript中添加一个指定名称的函数。

trans-unit.source: Add a list of handles (points) which can be used to deform the object being edited.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个手柄(点)列表,可用于使被编辑的对象变形。

trans-unit.source: Add a new mapping entry (in SDL2 format) to the mapping database. Optionally update already connected devices.
trans-unit.target: 在映射数据库中添加一个新的映射条目(SDL2格式)。可选择更新已连接的设备。

trans-unit.source: Add a new point that represents a node at the position set by pos. You can insert it at a specific index using the at_index argument. If you use the default value for at_index , the point is inserted at the end of the blend points array.
trans-unit.target: 在由 pos 设置的位置处添加一个代表 node 的新点。您可以使用 at_index 参数将其插入特定的索引。如果将默认值用于 at_index ，则将点插入到混合点数组的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Add a new point that represents a node on the virtual axis at a given position set by pos. You can insert it at a specific index using the at_index argument. If you use the default value for at_index , the point is inserted at the end of the blend points array.
trans-unit.target: 在 pos 设置的给定位置添加一个新点，该点代表虚拟轴上的 node 。您可以使用 at_index 参数将其插入特定的索引。如果将默认值用于 at_index ，则将点插入到混合点数组的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Add a node to a function of the VisualScript.
trans-unit.target: 在VisualScript的函数中添加一个节点。

trans-unit.source: Add a node to the selection.
trans-unit.target: 在选择中添加一个节点。

trans-unit.source: Add a point at the position. Appends the point at the end of the line.
trans-unit.target: 在该 position 添加一个点。将点追加到行尾。

trans-unit.source: Add a script at path to the Autoload list as name.

trans-unit.target: 在项目之间增加一个分隔符。分隔符也占用一个索引。

trans-unit.source: Add a track to the Animation. The track type must be specified as any of the values in the TYPE_* enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 在动画中添加一个轨道。轨道类型必须指定为TYPE_*枚举中的任意一个值。

trans-unit.source: Add a variable to the VisualScript, optionally giving it a default value or marking it as exported.
trans-unit.target: 在VisualScript中添加一个变量,可以选择给它一个默认值或标记为导出值。

trans-unit.source: Add an argument to a custom signal added with add_custom_signal.
trans-unit.target: 向自定义信号添加参数，该自定义信号通过add_custom_signal添加。

trans-unit.source: Add an array of bones for the next Vertex to use. Array must contain 4 integers.
trans-unit.target: 为下一个顶点添加一个骨头数组。数组必须包含4个整数。

trans-unit.source: Add an input to the node. This is only useful for nodes created for use in an AnimationNodeBlendTree
trans-unit.target: 将输入添加到节点。这仅对创建要在AnimationNodeBlendTree中使用的节点有用。

trans-unit.target: 添加一个带有“纹理”图标，文本“标签”和（可选）id的项目。如果没有传递“ id”，则“ id”成为商品索引。新项目将附加在末尾。

trans-unit.source: Add an unscaled billboard for visualization. Call this function during redraw.
trans-unit.target: 添加未缩放的广告牌以进行可视化。重绘时调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Add another Texture to this LargeTexture, starting on offset “ofs”.
trans-unit.target: 从“ ofs”偏移处开始，向此 LargeTexture 添加另一个Texture。

trans-unit.source: Add collision triangles to the gizmo for picking. A TriangleMesh can be generated from a regular Mesh too. Call this function during redraw.
trans-unit.target: 将碰撞三角形添加到Gizmo中以进行拾取。一个TriangleMesh可以从常规生成网了。重绘时调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Add color region (given the delimiters) and its colors.
trans-unit.target: 添加颜色区域(给定定界符)及其颜色。

trans-unit.source: Add lines to the gizmo (as sets of 2 points), with a given material. The lines are used for visualizing the gizmo. Call this function during redraw.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的材质将线添加到Gizmo（以2点为一组）。这些线用于可视化Gizmo。重绘时调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Add name for a blend shape that will be added with add_surface_from_arrays. Must be called before surface is added.
trans-unit.target: 为将与add_surface_from_arrays添加的混合形状添加名称。必须在添加曲面之前调用。

trans-unit.source: Add the control to a specific dock slot (see DOCK_* enum for options).
trans-unit.target: 将控件添加到特定的停靠槽中(选项见DOCK_*枚举)。

trans-unit.source: Add/Remove a path for the filter.
trans-unit.target: 添加/删除过滤器的路径。

trans-unit.source: Added padding applied to the bounding box when using invert. Setting this value too small may result in a “Bad Polygon” error. Default value: 100.
trans-unit.target: 使用 invert 时，已将填充添加到边框。将此值设置得太小可能会导致“多边形错误”错误。默认值： 100 。

trans-unit.source: Adding an index array puts this function into “index mode” where the vertex and other arrays become the sources of data, and the index array defines the order of the vertices.
trans-unit.target: 添加索引数组会使此函数进入“索引模式”，在该模式下，顶点和其他数组成为数据源，并且索引数组定义了顶点的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, a constant linear or angular velocity can be set for the static body, which will affect colliding bodies as if it were moving (for example, a conveyor belt).
trans-unit.target: 此外,还可以为静止体设置一个恒定的线速度或角速度,这将对碰撞体产生影响,就像它在移动一样(例如,传送带)。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the attributes used before the first vertex is added determine the format of the mesh. For example if you only add UVs to the first vertex, you cannot add color to any of the subsequent vertices.
trans-unit.target: 此外,在添加第一个顶点之前使用的属性决定了网格的格式。例如,如果你只给第一个顶点添加UV,你就不能给后续的任何顶点添加颜色。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the method can take an exclude array of objects or RIDs that are to be excluded from collisions, a collision_mask bitmask representing the physics layers to check in, or booleans to determine if the ray should collide with PhysicsBodys or Areas, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该方法可以采用要从碰撞中 exclude 的对象或RID的排除数组，代表要检入的物理层的 collision_mask 位掩码或布尔值以确定射线是否应分别与PhysicsBody或Area碰撞。 。

trans-unit.source: Address of the local machine in the network connecting it to this UPNPDevice.
trans-unit.target: 将本地计算机连接到此UPNPDevice的网络中的本地计算机的地址。

trans-unit.source: Adds animation to the player accessible with the key name.
trans-unit.target: 将 animation 添加到可通过键 name 访问的播放器。

trans-unit.source: Adds node as a child of the root node in the editor context.
trans-unit.target: 在编辑器上下文中将节点添加为 node 的子级。

trans-unit.source: Adds text after the cursor. If the resulting value is longer than max_length, nothing happens.
trans-unit.target: 在光标之后添加 text 。如果结果值长于max_length，则什么都不会发生。

trans-unit.source: Adds a 10-band equalizer audio effect to an Audio bus. Gives you control over frequencies from 31 Hz to 16000 Hz.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加10段均衡器音频效果。让你控制31Hz到16000Hz的频率。

trans-unit.source: Adds a 21-band equalizer audio effect to an Audio bus. Gives you control over frequencies from 22 Hz to 22000 Hz.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加21段均衡器音频效果。让你控制22Hz到22000Hz的频率。

trans-unit.source: Adds a 6-band equalizer audio effect to an Audio bus. Gives you control over frequencies from 32 Hz to 10000 Hz.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加6段均衡器音频效果。让你控制32Hz到10000Hz的频率。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Mesh to the CanvasItem’s draw commands. Only affects its aabb at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘制命令中添加一个网格。目前仅影响其aabb。

trans-unit.source: Adds a MultiMesh to the CanvasItem’s draw commands. Only affects its aabb at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘制命令中添加一个MultiMesh。目前仅影响其aabb。

trans-unit.source: Adds a NavigationMesh. Returns an ID for use with navmesh_remove or navmesh_set_transform. If given, a Transform2D is applied to the polygon. The optional owner is used as return value for get_closest_point_owner.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个NavigationMesh。返回用于navmesh_remove或navmesh_set_transform的ID 。如果给定，则将Transform2D应用于多边形。可选的 owner 用作get_closest_point_owner的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a NavigationPolygon. Returns an ID for use with navpoly_remove or navpoly_set_transform. If given, a Transform2D is applied to the polygon. The optional owner is used as return value for get_closest_point_owner.
trans-unit.target: 添加NavigationPolygon。返回与navpoly_remove或navpoly_set_transform一起使用的ID 。如果给定，则将Transform2D应用于多边形。可选的 owner 用作get_closest_point_owner的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a PoolVector2Array that contains the vertices of an outline to the internal array that contains all the outlines at a fixed position. You have to call make_polygons_from_outlines in order for this array to be converted to polygons that the engine will use.
trans-unit.target: 将包含轮廓顶点的PoolVector2Array添加到内部数组，该内部数组在固定位置包含所有轮廓。您必须调用make_polygons_from_outlines才能将该数组转换为引擎将使用的多边形。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Shape to the shape owner.
trans-unit.target: 将形状添加到形状所有者。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Shape2D to the shape owner.
trans-unit.target: 将Shape2D添加到形状所有者。

trans-unit.source: Adds a ShortCut.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个ShortCut。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Transform2D command to the CanvasItem’s draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘制命令中添加一个Transform2D命令。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Translation resource.
trans-unit.target: 添加翻译资源。

trans-unit.source: Adds a [cell] tag to the tag stack. Must be inside a [table] tag. See push_table for details.
trans-unit.target: 将 [cell] 标签添加到标签堆栈。必须在 [table] 标记内。有关详细信息，请参见push_table。

trans-unit.source: Adds a [color] tag to the tag stack.
trans-unit.target: 将 [color] 标签添加到标签堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Adds a [font] tag to the tag stack. Overrides default fonts for its duration.
trans-unit.target: 将 [font] 标签添加到标签堆栈。在其持续时间内覆盖默认字体。

trans-unit.source: Adds a [s] tag to the tag stack.
trans-unit.target: 将 [s] 标签添加到标签堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Adds a [table=columns] tag to the tag stack.
trans-unit.target: 将 [table=columns] 标签添加到标签堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Adds a [u] tag to the tag stack.
trans-unit.target: 将 [u] 标签添加到标签堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Adds a type node to the graph with name id.
trans-unit.target: 将名称为 id 的 type 节点添加到图。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Amplify audio effect to an Audio bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加放大音频效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Compressor audio effect to an Audio bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加压缩音频效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Delay audio effect to an Audio bus. Plays input signal back after a period of time.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加延迟音频效果。在一段时间后回放输入信号。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Distortion audio effect to an Audio bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加失真音频效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Panner audio effect to an Audio bus. Pans sound left or right.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加一个Panner音频效果。向左或向右平移声音。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Phaser audio effect to an Audio bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加Phaser音频效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Pitch shift audio effect to an Audio bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加一个音程转换音频效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Reverb audio effect to an Audio bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加混响音频效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds a band limit filter to the Audio Bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加一个带限滤波器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a band pass filter to the Audio Bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加一个带通滤波器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a body to the list of bodies exempt from collisions.
trans-unit.target: 在免于碰撞的机构列表中添加一个机构。

trans-unit.source: Adds a body to the list of bodies that this body can’t collide with.
trans-unit.target: 将一个实体添加到该实体无法碰撞的实体列表中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a bus at at_position.
trans-unit.target: 在 at_position 添加总线。

trans-unit.source: Adds a button with Texturebutton at column column. The button_idx index is used to identify the button when calling other methods. If not specified, the next available index is used, which may be retrieved by calling get_button_count immediately after this method. Optionally, the button can be disabled and have a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 在column column 添加带有Texture button 。该 button_idx 指数是用来调用其他方法时标识的按钮。如果未指定，则使用下一个可用索引，可以通过在此方法之后立即调用get_button_count来检索下一个可用索引。（可选）该按钮可以被 disabled 并具有 tooltip 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a button with label name and a cancel action to the dialog and returns the created button.
trans-unit.target: 将带有标签名称和取消操作的按钮添加到对话框，并返回创建的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Adds a button with label text and a custom action to the dialog and returns the created button. action will be passed to the custom_action signal when pressed.
trans-unit.target: 将带有标签文本和自定义操作的按钮添加到对话框，并返回创建的按钮。按下时，动作将传递到custom_action信号。

trans-unit.source: Adds a character to the font, where character is the unicode value, texture is the texture index, rect is the region in the texture (in pixels!), align is the (optional) alignment for the character and advance is the (optional) advance.
trans-unit.target: 向字体添加一个字符，其中 character 是unicode值， texture 是纹理索引， rect 是纹理中的区域（以像素为单位！）， align 是字符的（可选）对齐方式，而 advance 是（可选）提前。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child node. Nodes can have any number of children, but every child must have a unique name. Child nodes are automatically deleted when the parent node is deleted, so an entire scene can be removed by deleting its topmost node.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个子节点。节点可以有任意数量的子节点,但每个子节点必须有一个唯一的名字。当父节点被删除时,子节点会被自动删除,所以可以通过删除最上面的节点来删除整个场景。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child node. The child is placed below the given node in the list of children.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个子节点。子节点被放置在子节点列表中给定节点的下方。

trans-unit.source: Adds a chorus audio effect.
trans-unit.target: 添加合唱音频效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds a chorus audio effect. The effect applies a filter with voices to duplicate the audio source and manipulate it through the filter.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个合唱音频效果。该效果应用带有声音的滤波器来复制音频源,并通过滤波器对其进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds a circle command to the CanvasItem’s draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘制命令中添加一个圆环命令。

trans-unit.source: Adds a collision exception so the ray does not report collisions with the specified RID.
trans-unit.target: 添加碰撞异常，以便射线不会报告与指定RID的碰撞。

trans-unit.source: Adds a collision exception so the ray does not report collisions with the specified node.
trans-unit.target: 添加碰撞异常,使射线不报告与指定节点的碰撞。

trans-unit.source: Adds a collision shape to the physics engine for our CSG shape. This will always act like a static body. Note that the collision shape is still active even if the CSG shape itself is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 为我们的CSG形状在物理引擎中添加一个碰撞形状。这将始终像一个静态体一样。请注意,即使CSG形状本身被隐藏,碰撞形状仍然是活动的。

trans-unit.source: Adds a comma-delimited file extension filter option to the EditorFileDialog with an optional semi-colon-delimited label.
trans-unit.target: 将逗号分隔的文件扩展名过滤器选项添加到 EditorFileDialog 中,并带有可选的以分号分隔的标签。

trans-unit.source: Adds a constant directional force without affecting rotation.
trans-unit.target: 在不影响旋转的情况下,增加一个恒定的方向力。

trans-unit.source: Adds a constant force (i.e. acceleration).
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个恒定的力(即加速度)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a constant rotational force (i.e. a motor) without affecting position.
trans-unit.target: 在不影响位置的情况下,增加一个恒定的旋转力(即电机)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a constant rotational force without affecting position.
trans-unit.target: 在不影响位置的情况下,增加一个恒定的旋转力。

trans-unit.source: Adds a constant rotational force.
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个恒定的旋转力。

trans-unit.source: Adds a control to the box as a spacer. If true, begin will insert the spacer control in front of other children.
trans-unit.target: 将控件添加到框作为间隔。如果为 true ，则begin会将spacer控件插入其他孩子的前面。

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property info to a property. The dictionary must contain: name:String(the property’s name) and type:int(see TYPE_* in @GlobalScope), and optionally hint:int(see PROPERTY_HINT_* in @GlobalScope), hint_string:String.
trans-unit.target: 将自定义属性信息添加到属性。字典必须包含：姓名：字符串（属性的名称），然后键入：INT（见TYPE_ *在@GlobalScope），以及可选提示：INT（见PROPERTY_HINT_ *在@GlobalScope），hint_string：字符串。

trans-unit.source: Adds a fallback font.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个后备字体。

trans-unit.source: Adds a filter to the Audio Bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加一个过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a frame to the given animation.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的动画添加一个帧。

trans-unit.source: Adds a high pass filter to the Audio Bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加一个高通滤波器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a kerning pair to the BitmapFont as a difference. Kerning pairs are special cases where a typeface advance is determined by the next character.
trans-unit.target: 将字距调整对添加到 BitmapFont 作为区别。紧缩对是特殊情况，其中字体前进由下一个字符决定。

trans-unit.source: Adds a line command to the CanvasItem’s draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘制命令中添加一条线命令。

trans-unit.source: Adds a list tag to the tag stack. Similar to the bbcodes [ol] or [ul], but supports more list types. Not fully implemented!
trans-unit.target: 将列表标签添加到标签堆栈。与bbcode [ol] 或 [ul] 类似，但支持更多列表类型。尚未完全实施！

trans-unit.source: Adds a low pass filter to the Audio Bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加一个低通滤波器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mapping to forward the external port (between 1 and 65535) on the default gateway (see get_gateway) to the internal_port on the local machine for the given protocol proto (either TCP or UDP, with UDP being the default). If a port mapping for the given port and protocol combination already exists on that gateway device, this method tries to overwrite it. If that is not desired, you can retrieve the gateway manually with get_gateway and call add_port_mapping on it, if any.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个映射，以将默认网关（请参阅get_gateway）上的外部 port （请参阅get_gateway）转发到本地计算机上针对给定协议 proto （ TCP 或 UDP ，默认为UDP ）的 internal_port 。如果该网关设备上已经存在给定端口和协议组合的端口映射，则此方法将尝试覆盖它。如果不需要，可以使用get_gateway手动检索网关，并在其上调用add_port_mapping。

trans-unit.source: Adds a message if nonexistent, followed by its translation.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在,则添加一条信息,然后是其翻译。

trans-unit.source: Adds a meta tag to the tag stack. Similar to the bbcode [url=something]{text}[/url], but supports non-String metadata types.
trans-unit.target: 将元标记添加到标记堆栈。与bbcode [url=something]{text}[/url] 类似，但支持非String元数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new animation to the library.
trans-unit.target: 在库中添加一个新的动画。

trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的可检查项，并为其指定指定的ShortCut和图标 texture 。将复选框的标签设置为ShortCut的名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new checkable item and assigns the specified ShortCut to it. Sets the label of the checkbox to the ShortCut’s name.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的可检查项，并将指定的ShortCut分配给它。将复选框的标签设置为ShortCut的名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new checkable item with text label.
trans-unit.target: 添加带有文本 label 的新的可检查项。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new item and assigns the specified ShortCut and icon texture to it. Sets the label of the checkbox to the ShortCut’s name.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新项目，并为其指定指定的ShortCut和图标 texture 。将复选框的标签设置为ShortCut的名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new item with text label and icon texture.
trans-unit.target: 添加带有文本 label 和图标 texture 的新项目。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new item with text label.
trans-unit.target: 添加带有文本 label 的新项目。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new material to the internal material list for the plugin. It can then be accessed with get_material. Should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 将新材料添加到插件的内部材料列表中。然后可以使用get_material访问它。不应该被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new node to the graph. The position is used for display in the editor.
trans-unit.target: 向图中添加一个新节点。该 position 用于在编辑器中显示。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new point at the given position with the given identifier. The algorithm prefers points with lower weight_scale to form a path. The id must be 0 or larger, and the weight_scale must be 1 or larger.
trans-unit.target: 在具有给定标识符的给定位置添加新点。该算法更喜欢使用 weight_scale 较低的点形成路径。的 id 必须是0或更大，并且所述 weight_scale 必须是1或更大。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new radio button with text label.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个带有文本 label 的新单选按钮。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new radio check button and assigns a ShortCut to it. Sets the label of the checkbox to the ShortCut’s name.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的单选按钮，并为其分配一个快捷方式。将复选框的标签设置为ShortCut的名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new surface to specified Mesh with edited data.
trans-unit.target: 使用编辑的数据将新曲面添加到指定的网格。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new tab.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new track that is a copy of the given track from to_animation.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新轨道，该轨道是 to_animation 中给定轨道的副本。

trans-unit.source: Adds a newline tag to the tag stack.
trans-unit.target: 在标签堆栈中添加一个新行标签。

trans-unit.source: Adds a nine patch image to the CanvasItem’s draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘制命令中添加一个九个补丁图像。

trans-unit.source: Adds a notch filter to the Audio Bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加一个凹槽滤波器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a particles system to the CanvasItem’s draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘制命令中添加一个粒子系统。

trans-unit.source: Adds a point to a curve, at position, with control points in and out.
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个点的曲线，在 position ，与控制点 in 和 out 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a point to the curve. For each side, if the *_mode is TANGENT_LINEAR, the *_tangent angle (in degrees) uses the slope of the curve halfway to the adjacent point. Allows custom assignments to the *_tangent angle if *_mode is set to TANGENT_FREE.
trans-unit.target: 在曲线上添加一个点。对于每一侧，如果 *_mode 为TANGENT_LINEAR，则 *_tangent 角度（以度为单位）将使用曲线到相邻点的一半的斜率。如果 *_mode 设置为TANGENT_FREE，则允许对 *_tangent 角度进行自定义分配。

trans-unit.source: Adds a polygon to the CanvasItem’s draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘制命令中添加一个多边形。

trans-unit.source: Adds a polygon using the indices of the vertices you get when calling get_vertices.
trans-unit.target: 使用调用get_vertices时获得的顶点索引添加多边形。

trans-unit.source: Adds a polyline, which is a line from multiple points with a width, to the CanvasItem’s draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘制命令中添加一条折线，该折线是由多个点组成的一条线，具有宽度。

trans-unit.source: Adds a port mapping to forward the given external port on this UPNPDevice for the given protocol to the local machine. See UPNP.add_port_mapping.
trans-unit.target: 添加端口映射，以将此UPNPDevice上给定协议的给定外部端口转发给本地计算机。请参阅UPNP.add_port_mapping。

trans-unit.source: Adds a positioned force to the applied force and torque. As with body_apply_impulse, both the force and the offset from the body origin are in global coordinates. A force differs from an impulse in that, while the two are forces, the impulse clears itself after being applied.
trans-unit.target: 将定位的力添加到所施加的力和扭矩上。与body_apply_impulse一样，力和相对于身体原点的偏移都位于全局坐标中。力与冲力的不同之处在于，虽然两者是力，但冲力在施加后会清除。

trans-unit.source: Adds a positioned force to the body. Both the force and the offset from the body origin are in global coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在主体上添加一个定位的力。力和与主体原点的偏移都是全局坐标。

trans-unit.source: Adds a positioned impulse to the applied force and torque. Both the force and the offset from the body origin are in global coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 给施加的力和扭矩添加一个定位脉冲。力和身体原点的偏移都是以全局为坐标的。

trans-unit.source: Adds a primitive to the CanvasItem’s draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘图命令中添加基本​​体。

trans-unit.source: Adds a rectangle to the CanvasItem’s draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘制命令中添加一个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Adds a resource to the preloader with the given name. If a resource with the given name already exists, the new resource will be renamed to “name N” where N is an incrementing number starting from 2.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定 name 将资源添加到预加载器。如果已经存在具有给定 name 的资源，则新资源将重命名为“ name N”，其中N是从2开始的递增数字。

trans-unit.source: Adds a shape to the area, along with a transform matrix. Shapes are usually referenced by their index, so you should track which shape has a given index.
trans-unit.target: 在区域中添加一个形状,以及一个变换矩阵。形状通常以其索引为参考,所以你应该追踪哪个形状有给定的索引。

trans-unit.source: Adds a shape to the body, along with a transform matrix. Shapes are usually referenced by their index, so you should track which shape has a given index.
trans-unit.target: 在主体上添加一个形状,以及一个变换矩阵。形状通常以其索引为参考,所以你应该跟踪哪个形状有给定的索引。

trans-unit.source: Adds a shape to the tile.
trans-unit.target: 给瓷砖添加一个形状。

trans-unit.source: Adds a soft clip Limiter audio effect to an Audio bus.
trans-unit.target: 为音频总线添加一个软剪辑限制器音频效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds a surface generated from the Arrays to a mesh. See PRIMITIVE_TYPE_* constants for types.
trans-unit.target: 将从数组产生的曲面添加到网格中。类型请参考 PRIMITIVE_TYPE_*常量。

trans-unit.source: Adds a texture rect with region setting to the CanvasItem’s draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 将具有区域设置的纹理矩形添加到CanvasItem的绘制命令中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a texture to the BitmapFont.
trans-unit.target: 向 BitmapFont 添加纹理。

trans-unit.source: Adds a textured rect to the CanvasItem’s draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 在CanvasItem的绘制命令中添加纹理矩形。

trans-unit.source: Adds a top, left, bottom, and right margin to all Control nodes that are direct children of the container. To control the MarginContainer’s margin, use the margin_* theme properties listed below.
trans-unit.target: 向作为容器的直接子级的所有Control节点添加顶部，左侧，底部和右侧边距。要控制MarginContainer的边距，请使用下面列出的 margin_* 主题属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a transition between the given nodes.
trans-unit.target: 在给定节点之间添加一个过渡。

trans-unit.source: Adds a user-defined signal. Arguments are optional, but can be added as an Array of dictionaries, each containing name: String and type: int (see Variant.Type) entries.
trans-unit.target: 添加用户定义的 signal 。参数是可选的，但可以添加为字典数组，每个字典包含 name: String 和 type: int （请参见Variant.Type）条目。

trans-unit.source: Adds a vertex with the currently set color/uv/etc.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个带有当前设置的颜色/uv/等的顶点。

trans-unit.source: Adds an AudioEffect effect to the bus bus_idx at at_position.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个AudioEffect影响到总线 bus_idx 在 at_position 。

trans-unit.source: Adds an InputEvent to an action. This InputEvent will trigger the action.
trans-unit.target: 将InputEvent添加到动作。此InputEvent将触发操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds an [indent] tag to the tag stack. Multiplies “level” by current tab_size to determine new margin length.
trans-unit.target: 向标签堆栈添加 [indent] 标签。将“级别”乘以当前的tab_size以确定新的边距长度。

trans-unit.source: Adds an alignment tag based on the given align value. See Align for possible values.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的 align 值添加对齐标签。请参阅对齐以获取可能的值。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element at the beginning of the array.
trans-unit.target: 在数组的开头添加一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Adds an empty action to the InputMap with a configurable deadzone.
trans-unit.target: 将空操作添加到具有可配置 deadzone 的 InputMap 中。

trans-unit.source: Adds an image’s opening and closing tags to the tag stack.
trans-unit.target: 将图像的开始和结束标签添加到标签堆栈中。

trans-unit.source: Adds an index to index array if you are using indexed Vertices. Does not need to be called before adding Vertex.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用有索引的顶点,则向索引数组添加一个索引。在添加顶点之前不需要调用。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item that will act as a submenu of the parent PopupMenu node when clicked. The submenu argument is the name of the child PopupMenu node that will be shown when the item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个项目，该项目将在单击时充当父PopupMenu节点的子菜单。该 submenu 参数是孩子的名字的PopupMenu单击该项目时将显示节点。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the item list with no text, only an icon.
trans-unit.target: 在项目列表中添加一个项目,没有文字,只有图标。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the item list with specified text. Specify an icon of null for a list item with no icon.
trans-unit.target: 在项目列表中添加指定文字的项目。列表中没有图标的项目,图标为空。

trans-unit.source: Adds and removes buses to make the number of buses match amount.
trans-unit.target: 添加和删​​除总线以使总线数量与 amount 匹配。

trans-unit.source: Adds or changes a given entry in the object’s metadata. Metadata are serialized, and can take any Variant value.
trans-unit.target: 在对象的元数据中添加或更改给定的条目。元数据已序列化，并且可以采用任何Variant值。

trans-unit.source: Adds raw non-bbcode-parsed text to the tag stack.
trans-unit.target: 将非bbcode-parsed的原始文本添加到标签栈中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the ‘offset’ vector to the node’s global position.
trans-unit.target: 将“偏移”矢量添加到节点的全局位置。

trans-unit.source: Adds the given UPNPDevice to the list of discovered devices.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的UPNPDevice添加到发现的设备列表中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the given color to a list of color presets. The presets are displayed in the color picker and the user will be able to select them. Note: the presets list is only for this color picker.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的颜色添加到颜色预设列表中。预设显示在颜色选择器中，用户可以选择它们。注意：预设列表仅适用于该颜色选择器。

trans-unit.source: Adds the node to a group. Groups are helpers to name and organize a subset of nodes, for example “enemies” or “collectables”. A node can be in any number of groups. Nodes can be assigned a group at any time, but will not be added until they are inside the scene tree (see is_inside_tree). See notes in the description, and the group methods in SceneTree.
trans-unit.target: 将节点添加到组。组是命名和组织节点子集（例如“敌人”或“收藏品”）的助手。一个节点可以处于任何数量的组中。可以在任何时候为节点分配一个组，但是直到它们在场景树中时才可以添加（请参见is_inside_tree）。请参见说明中的注释以及SceneTree中的分组方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified prefix string after the numerical value of the SpinBox.
trans-unit.target: 在SpinBox的数值之后添加指定的 prefix 字符串。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified prefix string before the numerical value of the SpinBox.
trans-unit.target: 在SpinBox的数值之前添加指定的 prefix 字符串。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified color to the end of the ramp, with the specified offset
trans-unit.target: 以指定的偏移量将指定的颜色添加到坡道的末端。

trans-unit.source: Adjustments
trans-unit.target: Adjustments

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the rate at which the effect sweeps up and down across the frequency range.
trans-unit.target: 调整效果在整个频率范围内上下扫描的速度。

trans-unit.source: Affine operations (rotate, scale, translate) happen in parent’s local coordinate system, unless the Spatial object is set as top level. Affine operations in this coordinate system correspond to direct affine operations on the Spatial’s transform. The word local below refers to this coordinate system. The coordinate system that is attached to the Spatial object itself is referred to as object-local coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 仿射操作（旋转，缩放，平移）发生在父级的本地坐标系中，除非将 Spatial 对象设置为顶级。此坐标系中的仿射运算对应于 Spatial 变换上的直接仿射运算。下面的“局部”一词是指该坐标系。附加到 Spatial 对象本身的坐标系称为对象局部坐标系。

trans-unit.source: After editing a font (changing size, ascent, char rects, etc.). Call this function to propagate changes to controls that might use it.
trans-unit.target: 在编辑字体后(改变大小、上升、字符直角等)。调用此函数将更改传播给可能使用它的控件。

trans-unit.source: After initializing the interface you want to use you then need to enable the AR/VR mode of a viewport and rendering should commence.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化你想要使用的界面后,你就需要启用视口的AR/VR模式,渲染应该开始了。

trans-unit.source: After starting the client (connect_to_url), you will need to NetworkedMultiplayerPeer.poll it at regular intervals (e.g. inside Node._process).
trans-unit.target: 启动客户端（connect_to_url）之后，您将需要定期（例如在Node._process内部）对NetworkedMultiplayerPeer.poll进行轮询。

trans-unit.source: After starting the server (listen), you will need to NetworkedMultiplayerPeer.poll it at regular intervals (e.g. inside Node._process). When clients connect, disconnect, or send data, you will receive the appropriate signal.
trans-unit.target: 启动服务器（侦听）后，您需要定期对NetworkedMultiplayerPeer.poll进行轮询（例如，在Node._process内部）。当客户端连接，断开连接或发送数据时，您将收到适当的信号。

trans-unit.target: Align

trans-unit.target: 将粒子的Y轴与速度方向对齐。

trans-unit.target: AlignMode

trans-unit.source: All User Interface nodes inherit from Control. A control’s anchors and margins adapt its position and size relative to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 所有用户界面节点都从Control继承。控件的锚点和边距相对于其父级调整其位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: Allow or disallow selection of the item associated with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 允许或不允许选择与指定索引相关联的项目。

trans-unit.source: Allow single or multiple item selection. See the SELECT_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 允许选择单个或多个项目。请参见 SELECT_* 常量。

trans-unit.source: Allow single or multiple selection. See the SELECT_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 允许单选或多选。请参见 SELECT_* 常量。
